pullrequest.title: Added triangle3 class, and helper functions in other classes

content.raw: I'm not sure if this library is targeted at people with little experience in 3D graphics. If so, it might be worth mentioning that the order of the points defines the normal direction. But come to think of it, we then might need to go into deeper explanations for everything...
content.html: I'm not sure if this library is targeted at people with little experience in 3D graphics. If so, it might be worth mentioning that the order of the points defines the normal direction. But come to think of it, we then might need to go into deeper explanations for everything...
